# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]
## [16.0.1.1.0] - 2025-12-15
### Added
- [#1605](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1605) Add add-on product attribute with new product 150 min 0 MB for children

## [16.0.1.0.24] - 2025-12-09
### Fixed
- [#1684](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1684) Call super() on mail compose wizard onchange template wrapper

## [16.0.1.0.23] - 2025-11-20
### Fixed
- [#1671](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1671) Fix crm lead multi _compute_all_partner_leads_count

## [16.0.1.0.22] - 2025-11-11
### Fixed
- [#1662](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1662) Smart buttons leads packs invisible when partner false

### Changed
- [#1654](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1654) Hide "New" button in crm.lead pack tree view
- [#1638](https://git.coopdevs.org/coopdevs/som-connexio/odoo-somconnexio/-/merge_requests/1638) Update notes and activation notes literals

## [16.0.1.0.21] - 2025-11-06
### Fixed

## [16.0.1.0.18] - 2025-09-30

## [16.0.1.0.17] - 2025-09-19
